channel.title: Fanshawe College on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition

item.title: Fanshawe College Walkout: March 20th at Noon
item.description: Join those at Fanshawe College in a walkout from 12pm-2pm at Oasis (1001 Fanshawe College Blvd.). Show your support against cuts to OSAP by demanding free education, debt forgiveness, and defending the right to organize! Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/2048217158559440/
